page.title: 08Local Industry
page.content: { R. and D. Clark. R. and D. Clark make engineering tools for companies. They will make them to order. Most of the work is done by hand but some is done by machine. The building was built 25 years ago. The first firm who took it over made shooting sticks, the second made baby buggies and then R and D Clark took it. { K.Strong Fencing. On the way out of Barby there is a small Industrial Estate, but now it is mostly derelict. There is however a car repair and spray Garage and the Fencing firm. They actually make the fencing in a shed made out of old bits of fence. They make weave fencing or lap. Their prices are much cheaper than Payless. We were surprised to see a lady in charge of making the fences. Â£8.50 for a 6ft x 6 ft panel.
